title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
description: When importing a new image into the layout, the image is not being refreshed and the original image remains displayed.
OB: When importing a new image into the layout, the image is not being refreshed and the original image remains displayed.
EB: After importing a new image into the layout, the new image should be displayed, replacing the original image.
SR:
1. Open the layout where the image is displayed. 
2. Import a new image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout. 
3. Observe the layout after the import. The new image should be displayed, replacing the original image.
